transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello sir, good morning.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning. Sir, mai Sudesh bol raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan sir boliye.
Executive: Sir aapne kal ek concern aaya tha ki aap ek baar baat karna chah rahe the apne account manager se.
Customer: Haan haan sir like.
Executive: [inaudible] concern aa raha tha.
Customer: Okay can you can I speak in English?
Executive: Haan definitely sir definitely.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yeah.
Customer: On Saturday I got a lead in IndiaMART. Okay. I got a lead. Okay so when I tried to contact him they asked me to pay some amount because as my weekly [inaudible] was done expired so they have given me something. So what did I paid the amount.
Executive: Okay when I consulted him he said sir it was already closed before three before three hours.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: The lead is already closed.
Executive: So now your reversible lead is also credited in your account. You can also check in the balance section.
Customer: What sir?
Executive: We also credit the same lead.
Customer: Sir if you don't mind can you call me in 10 minutes or 15 minutes because I was doing my breakfast right now.
Executive: Okay you can you can take your breakfast I will call you after 10 minutes okay. You can reach out the same number.
Customer: It's okay.
(silence)
[unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer got a closed lead on Saturday.

- Customer was asked to pay amount to contact.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that reversible lead credited to account.

- Customer can check in the balance section.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, account
